name: places/ChIJo8z7FsdYwokRoMacVD6LoFM
formattedAddress: 1414 York Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1414 York Ave, New York, NY 10021-3129, USA

originalText.text:
Had surgery in July,2022. Absolutely horrific experiences
there as I was physically assaulted 3 times by certain malicious nurses in the 2nd post op. I reported it to my physician and other nursing staff, and hospital complaint department. They told me they were referring my complaints to their legal dept. and told my surgeon not to treat me anymore! Despicable!!!

originalText.text:
This is been my hospital since I moved here 33 years ago. I have Crohn's disease and I have been in every single part of the place I think. Imaging, blood work, inpatient, surgery, surgical procedures, doctor's offices. The dedication and superior treatment I have received is beyond expressing. Sure you meet the odd grouchy or unfriendly medical personnel but considering what they're being asked to do I'm not surprised especially in the age of covid.

I have had my life saved at least three times and my quality of life given back to me. Now that my husband has pancreatic cancer the treatment he is receiving in oncology surgery imaging blood work is beyond belief. We would never go anywhere else.

originalText.text: The hospital staff is ridiculously rude. They don’t help patients they are concerned with not getting a lawsuit. There is a lack of communication with the entire staff due to the doctors, nurses, and security. They aren’t here for safety they are here for protection of themselves. Do not go to this hospital. There are plenty of local hospitals who take care of people better.

originalText.text: WORST HOSPITAL experience ever! the gyno that I saw had extremely bad bedside manner, made me feel very uncomfortable. the billing is by far the most confusing thing ever - every doctor visit comes with two separate billing statement, from the facility (ny presp) and doctor (weill cornell), and the costs are over the top even with insurance. I’ve been trying to reach the doctors billing department, left multiple messages to sort out bill but still no response, it’s been several months at this point. DONT go here!

originalText.text: The relationship with families and patients is very poor and disrespectful. They behave to them extremely insensitive. This is not how a hospital should treat humans especially when they're going through so much.
